page.title: 04Boode Farm.
page.content: {Boode farm}was roughly built around {1840},but historians cannot say for certain.{Mr Fowler}who runs the farm,took up farming through his father who passed the farm onto him.In the days when his father owned it,the farm was quite small.More recently though,it has expanded.The total area of the farm today is{540}acres.The land is used to produce a variety of products.Mr Fowler keeps a variety of animals on his farm.These include;- {sheep,cattle,horses and dogs.}He also} grows a variety of{crops: {wheat,maize,barley and fodder. He doesn't know about the future.He might pass the farm onto one of his children if they are interested or he might sell the farm.We think this would be a shame as it has been in the family for a long time.
